name: Apple iPad Air 4th Generation
description: iPad is so versatile, it’s more than up to any task. Whether you’re working on a project, expressing your creativity or playing an immersive game, iPad is a fun and powerful way to get it done. Here are just a few of the countless things you can do with iPad.

name: Apple iPhone 11
description: I dont usually invest and upgrade my phone frequently, I used my last phone for 5 years, I will use this one for 5 years too.

name: dbE Accoustics HBT80
description: Wireless freedom and potentially superior sound quality over my current bluetooth speakers.

name: Logitech Z120s
description: 8 years strong! Z120s are reliable & good for everyday use. Upgrade only if I crave better sound.

name: LG 27MP400-B
description: An extra display. IPS display with minimal bezels offers a clear, expansive view for multitasking between design and coding.

name: OpenAI gpt-4o
description: GPT-4o is a chatbot that I use for everything from writing code to writing this website.

name: Adobe Family
description: Adobe's like the ultimate creative toolbox. Photoshop edits pics, Illustrator makes killer designs, and InDesign puts it all together. Industry pros love them!

name: Docker
description: Docker packages my also my clients applications in containers for consistent deployments across different environments, save my time and headaches.

name: Figma
description: Figma lets design teams brainstorm and edit interfaces together, like a Google Doc for designers.  Makes working on apps and websites a breeze.

name: Google Workspace
description: Google Workspace offers cloud-based tools like Gmail and Docs, letting me collaborate and work on projects anywhere, justifying the monthly cost.

name: Laravel Herd & Valet
description: Laravel Herd & Valet simplify Laravel development by providing built-in testing tools and streamlining local server management, saving me time on setup.

name: VS Code
description: No brainer, my primary code editor. I use it for everything from writing code to writing this website.

name: Reclaimed Industrial Oak Desk
description: No brainer, my primary code editor. I use it for everything from writing code to writing this website.

name: Aquascape
description: Transforming my desk into a mini zen garden with a calming aquascape, boosting focus and adding a touch of nature.
